label: Review Claude Changes
args: MANIFEST="$HOME/.claude/changes/latest.json"; if [ ! -f "$MANIFEST" ] || [ ! -s "$MANIFEST" ]; then echo 'No Claude changes found.'; exit 0; fi; if [ -L "$MANIFEST" ]; then MANIFEST=$(readlink "$MANIFEST"); fi; FILES=$(jq -r '[.changes[] | .file + ":" + (.line | tostring)] | unique | .[]' "$MANIFEST"); if [ -z "$FILES" ]; then echo 'No files in manifest.'; exit 0; fi; echo "Opening $(echo "$FILES" | wc -l | tr -d ' ') changed files..."; echo $FILES | xargs zed

label: Clear Claude Change Manifest
args: LATEST="$HOME/.claude/changes/latest.json"; if [ -L "$LATEST" ]; then TARGET=$(readlink "$LATEST"); rm -f "$TARGET" "$LATEST"; echo 'Manifest cleared.'; elif [ -f "$LATEST" ]; then rm -f "$LATEST"; echo 'Manifest cleared.'; else echo 'No manifest found.'; fi
